name: Mr. Mime

abilities.name: Invisible Wall
abilities.text: Whenever an attack (including your own) does 30 or more damage to Mr. Mime (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.) This power can't be used if Mr. Mime is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Meditate
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pok√©mon.

flavorText: If interrupted while miming, it will slap around the enemy with its broad hands.

strengths: Invisible Wall blocks ALL attacks doing 30+ damage
Immune to most heavy hitters in the format
Blocks Hitmonchan's Special Punch, Electabuzz's Thunderpunch
Meditate scales with damage on defender
weaknesses: Vulnerable to attacks doing exactly 20 damage
synergies: Alakazam - Damage Swap keeps Mr. Mime healthy
counters: Mewtwo - Psychic weakness and Psychic attack scales

competitiveHistory: Mr. Mime was a meta-defining card that warped deck building. Invisible Wall completely shut down many popular attackers like Hitmonchan and Electabuzz. Decks had to include answers to Mr. Mime or risk auto-losing. It enabled defensive strategies built around protecting Mr. Mime.

rulings.ruling: Invisible Wall prevents damage of 30 or more AFTER applying Weakness and Resistance.
A 20-damage attack against Mr. Mime with Psychic weakness becomes 40 damage, which is then prevented by Invisible Wall.
Invisible Wall prevents damage from YOUR OWN attacks too (relevant for effects like Earthquake).
Effects of attacks still happen even if damage is prevented. Status conditions are still applied.
If Mr. Mime is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed, Invisible Wall does not work.
